Package space.arim.api.chat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentFramework
    Contains common documentation for Component and ComponentBuilder
    JsonComponentFramework
    Contains common documentation for JsonComponent and JsonComponentBuilder
    MessageBuilder
    Contains common documentation for SimpleMessageBuilder and JsonMessageBuilder
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Colour
    A colour determines the colour of all letters following it.
    Component
    A part of a Message with a defined Colour and Style.
    ComponentBuilder
    Helper class for creating individual components.
    Format
    Some kind of formatting, whether a Colour or Style
    FormattingCodePattern
    Represents a regex pattern matching valid formatting codes.
    JsonComponent
    A specific kind of Component with JSON support.
    JsonComponentBuilder
    Helper class for creating individual json components.
    JsonMessageBuilder
    Helper class for creating Messages using JsonComponent.
    Message
    A sendable message comprised of an array of Component or JsonComponent objects.
    MessageUtil
    Accepts formatted strings and converts them to a Message.
    SimpleMessageBuilder
    Helper class for creating Messages.
    Style
    A style is some modification to the figure or shape of the letters following it.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Colour.ColourCatalog
    Each Colour is contained within this enum for convenience.
    Format.FormatCatalog
    Each Format is contained within this enum for convenience.
    JsonTag
    A json tag, e.g.
    Style.StyleCatalog
    Each Style is contained within this enum for convenience.
